function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in the number of entomologists working at WHO's headquarters in Geneva","Impact":"Loss of expertise in vector control and potential for less effective control of vector-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Increase investment in vector control, enhance political will, and prioritize the retention and recruitment of entomologists","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Entomologists, healthcare workers, and the general public","Owner":"WHO, government health agencies, and research institutions"},{"Description":"Shift in vector control approaches to uniform insecticide-based commodities","Impact":"Neglect of locally tailored approaches and ecological understanding, leading to less effective control of vector-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Promote a return to locally tailored approaches, emphasize ecological understanding, and encourage the development of rational and detailed understanding of vector behavior","Technologies":"Ecological monitoring technology, advanced entomological research tools","People":"Entomologists, environmental scientists, public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and government health agencies"}]}
